/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy traffic. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the sky, their windows reflecting the sunlight. Cars and buses fill the streets, adding to the dynamic energy of the city. In the distance, the iconic CCTV Tower punctuates the skyline, standing as a symbol of the city's modernity.
